headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 2X GTA$ and RP on The South Central Leak Finale
content:
One of the leads on Dr. Dre’s phone leads straight to a gang meet-up: the Families and the Ballas, at long last united by the common cause of crime. Meet up at the Davis Mega Mall and follow the Ballas’ convoy to the Rancho Projects, deep in Vagos territory, and see if you can requisition the tracks.

Complete the investigations and then earn 2X GTA$ and RP on The South Central Leak Finale.
